annual_report.name: Отчет по вакансиям за период
annual_report.view_query: SELECT id_rep, position_id, job_name, openings_count, avg_close_days, date_range, created_at FROM report WHERE date_range = %s

hiring.name: Результаты динамики найма за период
hiring.view_query: SELECT id, department_name, new_employees_count, active_vacancies_count, avg_hires_per_month, time_interval_months, created_at FROM hiring_dynamics_report WHERE time_interval_months = %s
